.country-selection-footer{position:relative;display:flex}.country-selection-footer__input{position:relative;box-sizing:border-box;width:50%;height:40px;margin:auto 6px;border:2px solid #8495a2;border-radius:5px;cursor:pointer}@media (min-width:1024px){.country-selection-footer__input{margin-right:12px}}.country-selection-footer__input:hover{background:rgba(0,96,175,.08)}.country-selection-footer__input .selector{position:relative;width:100%;height:100%;padding:5px 10px;overflow:hidden;color:#062942;font-size:16px;font-family:Franklin-Gothic-URW,helvetica,arial,sans-serif;line-height:1.625;white-space:nowrap}.country-selection-footer__input .selector:after,.country-selection-footer__input .selector:before{position:absolute;top:0;bottom:0;content:"";pointer-events:none}.country-selection-footer__input .selector:before{right:0;width:1.85em}.country-selection-footer__input .selector:after{right:10px;z-index:2;width:5px;height:5px;margin:auto;border-right:2px solid #8495a2;border-bottom:2px solid #8495a2;transform:rotate(45deg) translate(-12.5%,-12.5%);transform-origin:center}.country-selection-footer__input .selector select{padding:5px 10px}.country-selection-footer__input.region-select{display:inline-flex;min-width:182px;max-width:202px;margin:auto 6px auto 0;padding-left:10px;background:#fff;-webkit-user-select:none;-moz-user-select:none;-ms-user-select:none;user-select:none}@media (min-width:1024px){.country-selection-footer__input.region-select{width:100%;max-width:213px}}@media (min-width:1024px) and (max-width:1279.98px){.country-selection-footer__input.region-select{min-width:202px}}@media (min-width:1280px){.country-selection-footer__input.region-select{max-width:182px}}.country-selection-footer__input.region-select .selector{width:100%}.country-selection-footer__input.region-select .flag-icon{width:28px;pointer-events:none}.country-selection-footer__input.language-select{max-width:113px;margin:auto 0 auto 6px;background:#fff}@media (min-width:480px){.country-selection-footer__input.language-select{margin:initial}}.country-selection-footer__input.language-select .select{border:none}.country-selection-footer__input.expanded .selector:after{transform:rotate(225deg) translate(-12.5%,-12.5%)}.country-selection-footer__modal{position:absolute;bottom:calc(100% + 20px);left:0;display:flex;flex-flow:row wrap;max-width:350px;padding:20px 10px;background-color:#fff;border:2px solid #cdd4d9;border-radius:5px}@supports (display:grid){.country-selection-footer__modal{left:auto;display:grid;grid-auto-flow:column;grid-template-rows:repeat(6,auto);max-width:none}}@media (min-width:768px){.country-selection-footer__modal{padding:20px 18px}}.country-selection-footer__modal .region .flag-icon{width:20px}.country-selection-footer__modal .language,.country-selection-footer__modal .region{min-width:155px;max-width:225px;padding:1px 4px;color:#062942;font-family:Franklin-Gothic-URW,helvetica,arial,sans-serif;line-height:1.77778;text-align:left;text-decoration:none;cursor:pointer;-webkit-user-select:none;-moz-user-select:none;-ms-user-select:none;user-select:none}@supports (display:grid){.country-selection-footer__modal .language,.country-selection-footer__modal .region{min-width:none}}.country-selection-footer__modal .language:hover,.country-selection-footer__modal .region:hover{background:rgba(0,96,175,.04)}.country-selection-footer__modal .language:focus,.country-selection-footer__modal .region:focus{background:rgba(0,96,175,.08);outline:none}.country-selection-footer__modal:before{position:absolute;bottom:-30px;left:15%;width:0;height:0;border:14px solid transparent;border-top-color:#ccd3d8;content:""}.country-selection-footer__modal:after{position:absolute;bottom:-24px;left:15%;width:0;height:0;border-color:#fff transparent transparent;border-style:solid;border-width:14px 14px 11px;content:""}.country-selection-footer__modal.modal__region{right:0;left:0}@media (min-width:480px){.country-selection-footer__modal.modal__region{right:auto;left:0}}.country-selection-footer__modal.modal--language{right:0;left:0}.country-selection-footer__modal.modal--language:after,.country-selection-footer__modal.modal--language:before{right:15%;left:auto}@media (min-width:480px){.country-selection-footer__modal.modal--language{right:auto}.country-selection-footer__modal.modal--language:after,.country-selection-footer__modal.modal--language:before{right:auto;left:15%}}.country-selection-footer.region-au .language.au,.country-selection-footer.region-eu .language.eu,.country-selection-footer.region-fr .language.fr,.country-selection-footer.region-gb .language.gb,.country-selection-footer.region-ie .language.ie,.country-selection-footer.region-us .language.us{display:block}
